name: 3-in-1 - Mousetrap, Simon, Operation [GBA]
description: The Brotherhood Outcasts are trying to acquire advanced military technology, and the only way to open the vault containing these relics is by completing a tactical simulation only you can enter. In Operation: Anchorage you will re-live the epic Battle of Anchorage from Fallout® lore. Find your way into the simulation, stripped of resources, and survive within the rules set up by the simulation’s creators.
